parts.text: create a file with a minimal black and white 4k desktop wallpaper using css

message.text: create a file with a minimal black and white 4k desktop wallpaper using css

response.value:
I'll create a minimal black and white 4K desktop wallpaper using CSS. This will be an HTML file with embedded CSS that creates a clean, geometric design.

## Solution Steps:
1. Create an HTML file with CSS that renders a 4K resolution (3840x2160) wallpaper
2. Use a minimal black and white design with geometric shapes
3. Make it suitable for saving as a wallpaper

### [minimal-4k-wallpaper.html](file:///home/kestrel/Desktop/projects/minimal-4k-wallpaper.html)

Creates a minimal black and white geometric wallpaper with a centered circle design optimized for 4K displays.

````html

```` To use this wallpaper: 1. Open the HTML file in a browser 2. Press F11 for fullscreen 3. Take a screenshot or use browser tools to save as image 4. Set the saved image as your desktop wallpaper The design features a subtle gradient background with geometric elements that create a clean, professional look suitable for any desktop.
